category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 25-2 (Statue of Prescription for Disciplinary Action)
contents: Article 25-2 (Statue of Prescription for Disciplinary Action) ① The committee shall not deliberate or make a resolution after 3 years (5 years in the case of subparagraphs 1, 2, 4 to 9 of Appendix 1) from the date on which the cause for disciplinary action arose. . However, the period from the date of report/reception to the day before deliberation/resolution is excluded. In this case, in the case of a case for which disciplinary action is requested by the Sports Ethics Center, etc., the date of report/reception becomes the date of report/reception of the case by the institution requesting disciplinary action. Revised December 26, 2022. ② The burden of proving whether the statute of limitations for disciplinary action under Paragraph 1 has expired lies with the primary disciplinary decision agency.
